cast.overview: A dramatic thriller based on the incredible true David vs. Goliath story of American immigrant Dr. Bennet Omalu, the brilliant forensic neuropathologist who made the first discovery of CTE, a football-related brain trauma, in a pro player and fought for the truth to be known. Omalu's emotional quest puts him at dangerous odds with one of the most powerful institutions in the world.
cast.title: Concussion

cast.overview: Vignettes weaving together the stories of six individuals in the old West at the end of the Civil War. Following the tales of a sharp-shooting songster, a wannabe bank robber, two weary traveling performers, a lone gold prospector, a woman traveling the West to an uncertain future, and a motley crew of strangers undertaking a carriage ride.
cast.title: The Ballad of Buster Scruggs
cast.character: Cantina Scum (segment "The Ballad of Buster Scruggs")

cast.original_title: Birds of Prey (and the Fantabulous Emancipation of One Harley Quinn)
cast.overview: Harley Quinn joins forces with a singer, an assassin and a police detective to help a young girl who had a hit placed on her after she stole a rare diamond from a crime lord.
cast.title: Birds of Prey (and the Fantabulous Emancipation of One Harley Quinn)

details.biography: Matthew Joseph Willig (born January 21, 1969) is an American actor and former American football offensive tackle in the National Football League.
details.name: Matthew Willig
